definition.text: This indicator compares the current volume with the highest volume from a lookback array.

paragraphs.text: Highest Volume Index on the Charts
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| HighestVolumeIndex | HVI | value |
The parameters for the indicator's calculations can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "Highest Volume Index" Procedure Loop.
This indicator can be used as a confirmation to a primary indicator. An example of a confirmation could be when the index volume value is higher than the 50 threshold:
